title: Kikuyu Titles of the People – Multiple Choice Questions
description: Practice understanding Kikuyu terms for various titles and roles in society.

questions.question: What is the Kikuyu title for a traditional chief or king?
Which Kikuyu title is used for a respected elder?
What does "Mutongoria mũnene" refer to in Kikuyu?
Which title is used to refer to a young man?
Who is a "Mũrĩmũ wa ũhoro" in Kikuyu?
What title is used for a married woman in Kikuyu?
Which title is used for someone who teaches students?
Which title would a Kikuyu speaker use to refer to a friend?
What does “Wamũkũrũ” refer to when used casually?
